fuu kvqj,g wod< hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï fldgil msgm;la
fyda f.dkq lr we;s ,shú,a,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH fõ kï ta i|yd b,a,Sula 2013'11'25 Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾jrhd fj;
bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
kshñ; Èkg fmr tjeks b,a,Sula bÈßm;a lsÍug fkdyels jqjfyd;a by; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s ish¨ kvq jd¾;d 2013'11'29

.ïmy ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha wjika ù we;s jir mylg jvd merKs fudag¾ r: jdyk kvq jd¾;d 2013'12'01 Èfkka miqj wêlrK N+ñfha
